Headline: # N5 South Shore Night Bus Temporary Reroute at South Shore/78th
ShortDescription: N5 South Shore Night Bus buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 79th, Coles, 75th and South Shore due to police activity near South Shore/78th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#N5 South Shore Night Bus buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 79th, Coles, 75th and South Shore due to police activity near South Shore/78th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Western (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
